mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.model_id AS "modelId", a.model_name AS "modelName", a.status AS "status", u.name AS "createBy.name", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON a.create_by = u.id
mapper.select: SELECT a.status AS status, COUNT(*) AS num FROM attitude a WHERE a.model_id = #{modelId} AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} GROUP BY a.status
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attitude( id, model_id, model_name, status, create_by, create_date, del_flag, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{modelId}, #{modelName}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE attitude SET model_id = #{modelId}, model_name = #{modelName}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
